Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53899 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.26.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53899 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.26.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-virtualenv is earlier than 20.26.6-1, affected by CVE-2024-53899
